1455820.name: Strobophagia | Rave Horror Soundtrack
1455820.description:
The soundtrack of Strobophagia | Rave Horror is a meticulously crafted EDM experience, where each song draws inspirations from different parts of the very wide ranging and diverse rave culture.

At the heart of this 11-track musical experience lies DOX NARA, who has channeled this very powerful musical culture into this finecrafted album you can hear in the game.

By purchasing this soundtrack you can continue the party even after you have experienced this psychedelic and terrifying adventure.
